text: The Oppo Reno4 Lite is smartphone, developed by the company Oppo, included in the Reno series and is a simplified version of the Oppo Reno4. It was presented on 28 September 2020. In the India the smartphone was introduced on September 2, 2020, under the name Oppo F17 Pro. 1 October 2020 was presented Oppo A93, which is a similar model to the Oppo Reno4 Lite in addition to battery capacity and charging speed. 10 October 2020 Oppo A93 was presented in Indonesia called Oppo Reno 4 F. Category:Oppo mobile phones Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2020
title: Oppo Reno4 Lite
